pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.3: Atha kho aññataro upāsako yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.6: Atha kho so upāsako aññatarassa āpaṇikassa gharā kahāpaṇassa sappiṃ āharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.10: Atha kho so upāsako yena so āpaṇiko tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ āpaṇikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.11: “na kirāyyo, ayyāya sappinā attho, telena attho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.12: Handa te sappiṃ, telaṃ me dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.13: “Sace mayaṃ, ayyo, vikkītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ puna ādiyissāma, kadā amhākaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vikkāyissati;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.14: sappissa kayena sappi haṭaṃ, telassa kayaṃ āhara, telaṃ harissasī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.15: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.16: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.17: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.18: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.19: atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.21: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.24: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:1.27: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.1.8: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.1.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.1.13: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.2.1: Aññe aññasaññā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.2.2: Aññe vematikā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.2.3: Aññe anaññasaññā aññaṃ viññāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.2.4: Anaññe aññasaññā anaññaṃ viññāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np4:2.2.5: Anaññe vematikā anaññaṃ viññāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
